name: LoveFroggian
description:
Page under construction

"LoveFroggian" is a short 4-week minor production, based on the game "Frogger", remade with a Lovecraftian aesthetic.  This game is buggy and unpolished, yet it is the result of a team that's never worked together before coming together and attempting to make a game.  Please feel free to offer comments and critique that will help us to grow as professionals.  This is a the final product and will likely not receive any further updates.

Instructions

- Use the arrow keys to move

- Pressing the ESC key will open the menu buttons

- You must find all the collectible relics and return to the starting lane to "clear" a level.

Known Issues:

- The levels do not transition upon clearing them.  You must return to the Main Menu and choose a new level to see them.

- The player character does not change direction once you reach one end of a level.

- Some collision detection may be missing.

- There is no music.
